title: Bought Riot Points But didnt recieve
body: I bought 50USD worth of riot points, but I havent recieved them, My card was charged immediately.

replies.body:
Hey all,

Just dropping by to let you know the team is aware of the issue and investigating. The good news is that it looks like the purchases are still being tracked, there just seems to be an issue with granting the RP to the account itself.  Once that can be resolved the RP should be granted to the account as normal (just a little delayed)

Edit: Looks like as I was writing this message the issue was fixed and RP should be granted :D
same i just bought 50USD but, i didnt get riot points. so annoying
